com.vector.cfg.workflow.groovy.parse

Class WfConverters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vector.cfg.workflow.groovy.parse.WfConverters

  • @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public final class WfConverters
extends java.lang.Object
    WfConverters class provides static Functions to convert different object into each other.

    The automation interface is typed strongly. In some cases, however, e.g. when specifying file locations, it is desirable to allow for a range of possibly parameter types. This is achieved by accepting parameters of type Object and converting the given parameters to the desired type. WfConverters provides general purpose Functions performing value conversions used throughout the automation interface.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    • Field Detail

      • TO_SCRIPT_PATH_CONVERTER

        @PublishedField
public static final java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Object,java.nio.file.Path> TO_SCRIPT_PATH_CONVERTER
        TO_SCRIPT_PATH_CONVERTER attempts to convert arbitrary Objects to Paths using IScriptExecutionContext#resolvePath(Object).

      • TO_SHORT_NAME_PATH_CONVERTER

        @PublishedField
public static final java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Object,java.lang.String> TO_SHORT_NAME_PATH_CONVERTER

        TO_SHORT_NAME_PATH_CONVERTER attempts to convert arbitrary Objects to short name path Strings. The following conversions are implemented:

        • For null or String arguments the given argument is returned. No conversion is applied.
        • MIReferrables are converted using AsrPath.create(MIReferrable).
        • IWfReferrables are converted using IWfReferrable.getAutosarPath().
        • All other Objects are converted by converting the String obtained from Object.toString().
        For thrown Exceptions see the used functions described above.
